item.title:
Matt Diggity: I spent 6 months testing AI SEO tactics for clients.
One saw 2,300% AI traffic growth and now appea...
item.description:
I spent 6 months testing AI SEO tactics for clients.
One saw 2,300% AI traffic growth and now appears in 90+ AI overviews (vs zero before).
Here's the exact 4-step framework we used:
1. Finding AI Opportunities:
â€¢ Use Surfer AI Tracker/Ahrefs Brand Radar to see how often AI platforms mention your brand vs. your competitors â€¢ Plug in your brand and theirs, then filter for AI keywords theyâ€™re winning that youâ€™re not â€¢ Those are the exact topics you need to target and steal

item.title:
Chris Hoffmann: We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company.
However, for my first 7 years a...
item.description:
We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company.
However, for my first 7 years as CEO, I held this belief:
Organic growth > Growth via acquisition.
Between 2016 and 2022, we scaled Hoffmann Brothers from $9M â†’ $80M organically.
We focused on:
âœ… Building a proven operations playbook âœ… Driving consistent results with that playbook âœ… Developing leadership talent deep enough to scale or integrate
That foundation made us ready to acquire--not just eager to.
Too many entrepreneurs in home services get distracted by:
âŒ â€œWeâ€™ve acquired X companiesâ€ âŒ â€œWeâ€™re in X marketsâ€ âŒ â€œWeâ€™re rolling up the industryâ€
What they really need?
To master the business they already own.
We resisted the acquisition temptation early. And that made us far more capable now.
item.content:encoded:
We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company. However, for my first 7 years as CEO, I held this belief: Organic growth > Growth via acquisition. Between 2016 and 2022, we scaled Hoffmann Brothers from $9M â†’ $80M organically. We focused on: âœ… Building a proven operations playbook âœ… Driving consistent results with that playbook âœ… Developing leadership talent deep enough to scale or integrate That foundation made us ready to acquire--not just eager to. Too many entrepreneurs in home services get distracted by: âŒ â€œWeâ€™ve acquired X companiesâ€ âŒ â€œWeâ€™re in X marketsâ€ âŒ â€œWeâ€™re rolling up the industryâ€ What they really need? To master the business they already own. We resisted the acquisition temptation early. And that made us far more capable now.

ä½œè€…: Chris Hoffmann (@STLChrisH)

item.title: Cloudflare Radar: #Internet traffic in #Iran has been recovering since Saturday, though recovery appears to be primari...
item.description: #Internet traffic in #Iran has been recovering since Saturday, though recovery appears to be primarily on fixed infrastructure providers. Fixed providers have seen strong traffic growth, while major mobile providers @www_mci_ir and @irancell remain largely offline. https://t.co/mDHNBXUMAs

item.title:
War of Nova: Data talks: @warofnova, our first flagship title, crushed it with Season 1.
âœ… Consistent organic gr...
item.description:
Data talks: @warofnova, our first flagship title, crushed it with Season 1.
âœ… Consistent organic growth and retention. âœ… $2M in-app revenue / 3,100+ paying users. âœ… Average session length 30+ minutes. âœ… Web2 ARPDAU $52 / Web3 ARPDAU $102. âœ… Real-time guild coordination and strategy.
Next up, $RCADE TGE and @SkyborneLegacy Phoenix Flight launch. The best part is that we're just getting started.
